name: Disney Art Tumblrs
description:
Developed custom Tumblr theme to power three separate UGC contests synced to the movie premieres of Disney's Alice Through the Looking Glass, Pirates of the Caribbean and the 20th anniversary of Pixar's Toy Story

Developed and then executed visual concepts for each franchise, including graphic design, production art, and development

The theme includes a scrolling animation with customizable fonts, colors, and images, including a compressing navigation, parallax effect, and loading animations
